Text: Please not there is a little blurred bar at the top, and the occasional watermark pops up.

@bamjuice who said: "Please not there is a little blurred bar at the top, and the occasional watermark pops up."

Uhm... yeah, it is after all, a DVDScreener, those almost always have watermarks, some of them have the run time on the screen or a 'serial' to locate whoever leaked the screener, so it needs to be blurred out to protect the identity of whomever leaked it =).
